member.name: T:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2
member.summary: Eto.Forms extension methods

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.GetStandardForm(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout)
member.summary: Gets a standard form window to display

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.GetStandardForm(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Eto.Forms.TableLayout,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a standard form window to display with scrollable contents

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.GetTabbedForm(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Eto.Forms.Control[])
member.summary: Gets a Form window for multiple tabbed contents
member.param: List of controls to display in the tabs. Set the Tag property of the control to display as the tab text.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.Center(Eto.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Centers the form on the screen.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.GetStandardContainer
member.summary: Gets the standard control container (DynamicLayout)

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.CreateDialog(Eto.Forms.Control,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and returns a Dialog window.
member.param: Control to display in the dialog.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddHeader(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a header text to the container.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddDescription(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a description row to the container.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddEditTextBox(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.Double,System.String,System.Action{Eto.Forms.TextBox,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a textbox for editing a double (numeric) value.
member.param: Current value to display on the textbox

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddDropDown(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Action{Eto.Forms.DropDown,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a DropDown with selectable items
member.param: Index of the currently selected item (zero-based)

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddCheckBox(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Action{Eto.Forms.CheckBox,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a CheckBox

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddNumericStepper(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Action{Eto.Forms.NumericStepper,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a numeric stepper (selector)
member.param: The current value of the stepper

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddButtonWithLabel(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Eto.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a button with a label.
member.param: Text to be displayed in the button

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddButton(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,System.String,System.Action{Eto.Forms.Button,System.EventArgs})
member.summary: Adds a button
member.param: Text to be displayed in the button

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddControl(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout,Eto.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Adds a control to the container.

member.name: M:DWSIM.ExtensionMethods.Eto.Extensions2.AddEmptySpace(Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout)
member.summary: Adds an empty row to the container for spacing purposes.

member.name: M:DWSIM.UI.Shared.Common.IsValidDouble(System.String)
member.summary: checks if the string is a valid double-precision number.

member.name: M:DWSIM.UI.Shared.Common.GetEditorFontSize
member.summary: returns the size of the font for Cross-Platform UI editors.

member.name: M:DWSIM.UI.Shared.Common.Center(Eto.Forms.Form)
member.summary: centers the form on the current screen.

member.name: M:DWSIM.UI.Shared.Common.GetDefaultEditorForm(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Eto.Forms.DynamicLayout)
member.summary: returns a form whose contents are defined by the content argument (Dynamic Layout)

member.summary: returns a form whose contents are defined by the content argument (Pixel Layout)

member.summary: returns a form whose contents are defined by the TableLayout argument
